body: Heal—Creatures heal a number of points of ability damage to one ability score (your choice) equal to your channel bonus. Harm—Creatures are sickened until the end of your next turn, plus a number of rounds equal to your channel penalty. At cleric level 10, you may select one creature as the target of a contagion in addition to the effects of the channeled energy. At cleric level 20, all creatures in the area are subject to contagion in addition to the effects of the channeled energy.
name: Disease
